sentences.en: A new wave, an anomalous wave which won't stop , but rather win.
sentences.cn: 新的浪潮, 这不同寻常的浪潮不得胜利绝不罢休.

sentences.en: Achromatopsia and anomalous trichromatism should call color to become aware unusual.
sentences.cn: 色盲及色弱应称为色觉异常.

sentences.en: Advanced forms of life may be anomalous in the universe.
sentences.cn: 高级生命形式在宇宙中可能是反常的.

sentences.en: For years this anomalous behaviour has baffled scientists.
sentences.cn: 几年来这种反常行为让科学家们很困惑。

sentences.en: Her anomalous teaching method draws a large number of students.
sentences.cn: 她那不同平常的教学方式吸引了大批学生.
他在此的身份很不寻常。

sentences.en: Methods 5 cases of portion anomalous pulmonary venous drainage were analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.cn: 方法回顾分析5例部分型肺静脉畸形引流的临床资料.

sentences.en: Some of the cave - animals should be very anomalous.
sentences.cn: 穴居 动物可能会非常特别.

sentences.en: The anomalous nucleon moments are due to hadronic effects.
sentences.cn: 反常核子磁矩是由强子效应引起的.

sentences.en: The anomalous vapor transport gives a bigger contribution to the heavy rain.
sentences.cn: 异常水汽输送在这次暴雨中占了较大的比例.

sentences.en: The experimental results show the efficiency of the BGP Anomalous Traffic Generator.
sentences.cn: 实验表明通过这种方法构造的BGP异常流量是有效的.

sentences.en: The mechanism of this anomalous vascular response is unknown.
sentences.cn: 此种不规则的血管反应的机制尚不清楚.

sentences.en: The resistivity contours appear much less diagnostic of anomalous bodies below the surface.
sentences.cn: 地面下方的异常体,在视电阻率等值线上并无明显的反映.

sentences.en: This anomalous Nazi - Sponsored haven for Jews, also called Theresienbad, is almost a byword in Europe.
sentences.cn: 这个由纳粹创办的,非同寻常的犹太人避难所, 又叫作特莱西恩巴德, 在欧洲颇有名气.

sentences.en: This anomalous result showed up regardless of the patient's primary diagnosis.
sentences.cn: 不论病人主要诊断的毛病为何,都出现这项失常.

words.tran_cn: [生物]异常的；不规则的；不恰当的

trans.tran_cn: 不规则的，不协调的，不恰当的，破格的
trans.tran_en: different from what you expected to find
